LightningComponentBundle.description: Lightning Web Component for displaying CVMA Event attendee list with privacy controls and summary statistics

property.name: eventId
property.label: Event ID
property.description: The Event record ID to display attendees for

property.name: showPrivateInfo
property.label: Show Private Info
property.description: Whether to show full member details (requires proper permissions)

property.name: maxDisplayCount
property.label: Max Display Count
property.description: Maximum number of attendees to show initially

property.name: showSummaryStats
property.label: Show Summary Stats
property.description: Whether to display RSVP summary statistics

property.name: allowExpansion
property.label: Allow Expansion
property.description: Whether to allow expanding the attendee list
